mapper.select: /* getCSchedule */ SELECT c.schd_no , h.hos_fc_name , e.emp_nm FROM tb_clinic_schedule c LEFT JOIN tb_employee e ON c.emp_no = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN tb_hospital_facility h ON c.hos_fc_no = h.hos_fc_no ORDER BY c.hos_fc_no

/* getRcepNo */ SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM') || '02' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL( (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(r.rcept_no,-3))) FROM tb_receipt r WHERE rcept_no LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM')||'%') ,0)+1, '000')) AS rcept_no FROM dual
/* selectPVST */ SELECT com_code , com_code_grp , com_code_name FROM tb_common_code WHERE com_code_grp = 'PVST'

/* selectWaitPat */ SELECT c.treat_no , r.rcept_no as rcept_no , p.pat_name as pat_name , p.pat_code as pat_code , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - SUBSTR(p.pat_brthdy,0,4) as pat_age , c2.com_code_name as pat_gen , c1.com_code_name as pat_wait , c3.com_code_name as pat_path , c4.com_code_name as pat_first , c5.com_code_name as pat_day , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , hf.hos_fc_name as hos_fc_name
FROM tb_clinic c INNER JOIN tb_receipt r INNER JOIN tb_patient p INNER JOIN tb_common_code c2 ON p.pat_gen_code = c2.com_code AND c2.com_code_grp = 'GEND' ON r.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_common_code c3 ON r.rcept_path_code = c3.com_code AND c3.com_code_grp = 'PVST' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c4 ON r.rcept_first_exam_code = c4.com_code AND c4.com_code_grp = 'FEXM' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c5 ON r.rcept_day_code = c5.com_code AND c5.com_code_grp = 'DAYN' ON c.rcept_no = r.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs INNER JOIN tb_hospital_facility hf ON hf.HOS_FC_NO = cs.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no ON r.schd_no = cs.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_common_code c1 ON c.clnic_sttus_code = c1.com_code AND c1.com_code_grp = 'STAT' WHERE c.clnic_sttus_code = 'WAIT'

/* selectOneWaitPat */ SELECT c.treat_no , r.rcept_memo as rcept_memo , r.rcept_no as rcept_no , p.pat_name as pat_name , p.pat_code as pat_code , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - SUBSTR(p.pat_brthdy,0,4) as pat_age , c2.com_code_name as pat_gen , c1.com_code_name as pat_wait , c3.com_code_name as pat_path , c4.com_code_name as pat_first , c5.com_code_name as pat_day , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , e.emp_no as empNo , hf.hos_fc_name as hos_fc_name , TO_CHAR(r.recept_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') as recept_time FROM tb_clinic c INNER JOIN tb_receipt r INNER JOIN tb_patient p INNER JOIN tb_common_code c2 ON p.pat_gen_code = c2.com_code AND c2.com_code_grp = 'GEND' ON r.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_common_code c3 ON r.rcept_path_code = c3.com_code AND c3.com_code_grp = 'PVST' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c4 ON r.rcept_first_exam_code = c4.com_code AND c4.com_code_grp = 'FEXM' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c5 ON r.rcept_day_code = c5.com_code AND c5.com_code_grp = 'DAYN' ON c.rcept_no = r.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs INNER JOIN tb_hospital_facility hf ON hf.HOS_FC_NO = cs.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no ON r.schd_no = cs.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_common_code c1 ON c.clnic_sttus_code = c1.com_code AND c1.com_code_grp = 'STAT' WHERE c.treat_no = #{treatNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.detail_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS detail_reg_date, c.rcept_first_exam_code, TO_CHAR(c.recept_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS recept_time, E.emp_nm, DI.diss_kor_name, B.treat_no, D.pat_code FROM tb_chart_detail A INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC B ON B.TREAT_NO = A.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT C ON C.RCEPT_NO = B.RCEPT_NO INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC_SCHEDULE CS ON C.SCHD_NO = CS.SCHD_NO INNER JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE E ON CS.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT D ON D.PAT_CODE = C.PAT_CODE INNER JOIN TB_DISEASE DI ON DI.DISS_CODE_NO = A.DISS_CODE_NO WHERE D.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} and A.DISS_CODE_NO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY treat_no DESC

/*getAllByDateAndPatCode*/ SELECT CD.DETAIL_NO , TO_CHAR(CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS DETAIL_REG_DATE , (SELECT CC1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE CC1 WHERE CC1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'FEXM' AND R.RCEPT_FIRST_EXAM_CODE = CC1.COM_CODE) AS RCEPT_FIRST_EXAM_CODE , (SELECT CC1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE CC1 WHERE CC1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'DAYN' AND R.RCEPT_DAY_CODE = CC1.COM_CODE) AS RCEPT_DAY_CODE , (SELECT CC1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE CC1 WHERE CC1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'HSPT' AND P.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = CC1.COM_CODE) AS PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS , D.DISS_CODE_NO , D.DISS_ENG_NAME , D.DISS_KOR_NAME , SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG( T.TRE_CONTENT || ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY T.TRE_CONTENT), '([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3'),1,LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG( T.TRE_CONTENT || ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY T.TRE_CONTENT), '([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3'))-1) TRE_CONTENT , SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG( P.PHYSIO_CONTENT || ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY P.PHYSIO_CONTENT), '([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3'),1,LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG( P.PHYSIO_CONTENT || ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY P.PHYSIO_CONTENT), '([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3'))-1) PHYSIO_CONTENT , SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG( I.INSPC_TYPE || ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY I.INSPC_TYPE), '([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3'),1,LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG( I.INSPC_TYPE || ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY I.INSPC_TYPE), '([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3'))-1) INSPC_TYPE , SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG( MIL.MEDI_ITEM_NAME || ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY MIL.MEDI_ITEM_NAME), '([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3'),1,LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG( MIL.MEDI_ITEM_NAME || ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY MIL.MEDI_ITEM_NAME), '([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3'))-1) MEDI_ITEM_NAME , E.EMP_NM FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL CD INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON CD.TREAT_NO = C.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R ON C.RCEPT_NO = R.RCEPT_NO INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT P ON R.PAT_CODE = P.PAT_CODE INNER JOIN TB_DISEASE D ON CD.DISS_CODE_NO = D.DISS_CODE_NO INNER JOIN TB_TREATMENT_LIST TL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = TL.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_TREATMENT T ON TL.TRE_CODE = T.TRE_CODE INNER JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY_LIST PL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = PL.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY P ON PL.PHYSIO_CODE = P.PHYSIO_CODE INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION_LIST IL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = IL.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_INSPECTION I ON IL.INSPC_CODE = I.INSPC_CODE INNER JOIN TB_PRESCRIPTION PR ON CD.DETAIL_NO = PR.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_MEDI_ITEM_LIST MIL ON PR.MEDI_ITEM_CODE = MIL.MEDI_ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC_SCHEDULE CS ON CS.SCHD_NO = R.SCHD_NO INNER JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE E ON CS.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{detailRegDate} AND P.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND CD.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} GROUP BY CD.DETAIL_NO , DETAIL_REG_DATE , RCEPT_FIRST_EXAM_CODE , RCEPT_DAY_CODE , PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS , D.DISS_CODE_NO , D.DISS_ENG_NAME , D.DISS_KOR_NAME , E.EMP_NM
